product_name: The North Face Kichatna Jacket - Men's
long_description: The waterproof, breathable GORE-TEX(R) Kichatna jacket for men is specifically designed by The North Face for elite ski mountaineering and backcountry touring under the harshest conditions. Nylon GORE-TEX Pro Shell fabric delivers durable, enhanced waterproof, breathable and windproof performance to meet the demands of outdoor professionals. Shoulders and underarms are reinforced for rugged durability. Textured grip zones on shoulders and hips keep your pack in place. Pit zips let you vent excess heat instantly. Helmet-compatible hood has hidden cord locks and a laminated wire brim, and is fully adjustable for maximum protection that won't restrict your visibility. Zippered handwarmer pockets are harness- and pack-friendly. Two zippered chest pockets keep essentials handy. The North Face Kichatna jacket for men features a removable powder skirt with elastic gripper. Adjustable hem and cuffs seal out weather. As part of The North Face Summit Series(TM), this jacket features the most advanced fabrics and technology to suit the most ambitious technical skiers or riders.
short_description: The waterproof, breathable GORE-TEX(R) Kichatna jacket for men is specifically designed by The North Face for elite ski mountaineering and backcountry touring under the harshest conditions.
